general_info.summary: This document outlines guidelines for several key areas related to international visitors and programs, specifically mentioning visa and FRO/FRRO procedures, medical insurance requirements, and observership programs.

library_info.summary: The library operates from Monday to Friday, typically from 8:35 AM to 10:00 PM, with extended hours until midnight during examinations. On the 1st, 3rd, and 5th Saturdays, it is open from 8:35 AM to 7:00 PM. Book circulation is available daily between 9:00 AM and 5:30 PM. Public access and access for the under-privileged section of society, with appropriate approval, is from 8:35 AM to 7:00 PM on weekdays.
library_info.raw_content:
• Monday to Friday: 8:35 AM to 10:00 PM
• Working Saturdays: (1st, 3rd, and 5th Saturday) - 8:35 AM to 7:00 PM
• During Examination: (Monday to Friday) - Upto 12 Midnight
• Book Circulation Timings: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
• Library is accessible to the public with the due approval of the competent authority (Monday to Friday): 8.35 A.M. to 7 P.M.
• Library is accessible to the Under Privileged Section of Society with the due approval of the competent authority (Monday to Friday) : 8.35 A.M. to 7 P.M.
